name: Vampire Defender of the Crystal
description: We present you our game Vampire Defender of the Crystal. According to the plot, we are a simple guy who did not work, did not think, and once he woke up in the body of a vampire, he realized that he still died and it was a dream. In this game you need to take control of a vampire who must protect his kind, or rather the crystal of life. Control melee with the left mouse button, shoot with the right mouse button, in order to throw a grenade you need to press G, move to A and D jump to the space bar, as well as the restart button R.
